original_title: Three injured in a shooting at a house in Ragama
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Three people have sustained injuries in a shooting at a house in Caritas, in Walpola, Ragama.
A 49-year-old working at a fish market, his mother and a 17-year-old youth from a neighboring house sustained injuries in the shooting.
Sri Lanka Police said the shooting was carried out by a group of people who arrived on a motorcycle on Thursday (14) night.
Investigations are underway to find the group involved in the shooting.
